summary: Generative AI Engineer with 2+ years of experience designing and deploying production-grade LLM and agentic solutions across enterprise environments. Passionate about solving real-world problems at scale through intelligent systems.

education.degree: M.S. in Engineering Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
education.details: Focus on AI/ML, Advanced NLP, Deep Learning, and Large Language Models.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Specialization in Artificial Intelligence)
education.details: Specialized in AI with comprehensive coursework in Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision, Speech Processing, Reinforcement Learning, and Robotics. Published 2 conference papers.

experience.role: Advanced App Engineering Analyst - GenAI Specialist
experience.details: Architected production-grade LLM solutions for reverse engineering SDLC workflows. Achieved 89% coverage in Technical Analysis with 9% efficiency improvement. Designed custom RAG pipelines using LangChain and AutoGen. Mentored 30+ engineers. Recognized with Wall of Fame Award (Q4 FY24) and Client Recognition Award.
Developed deep learning framework for deepfake video detection achieving 96% accuracy. Published in GCAT 2024. Conducted comprehensive literature review on AI-generated media forensics.

Conducted training sessions on Python, agentic AI frameworks (LangChain, AutoGen, CrewAI), and GenAI best practices for 30+ junior engineers. Developed structured curriculum and provided hands-on mentorship.

projects.title: Detection of Real and Manipulated Videos using Transfer Learning
projects.description: Developed deep learning framework for deepfake detection achieving 96% accuracy on 6,500-video dataset. Published in GCAT October 2024.

projects.title: Indian Sign Language Generation from Live Audio/Text (Tamil)
projects.description: Real-time speech-to-sign translation system for Tamil-speaking hearing-impaired community. Published in ICACCS March 2023.

projects.title: Multi-Agent Deep Reinforcement Learning for Highway Merging
projects.description: Autonomous vehicle on-ramp merging solution using DQN/DDQN with CNN-based policy network, Experience Replay buffers, and complex reward function balancing safety and efficiency.

projects.title: Stock Price Prediction Using Deep Q-Learning
projects.description: Automated trading system learning optimal policies (Buy, Sell, Hold) using DQN with Experience Replay and dual-network architecture. Tested on Adani Enterprises stock data.

projects.title: Speech Emotion Recognition System
projects.description: CNN-based emotion recognition achieving 81.11% accuracy. Implemented acoustic feature extraction (MFCCs, chroma, mel-spectrograms, tonnetz).

projects.title: Telugu News Article Classification
projects.description: Low-resource NLP solution with custom Word2Vec embeddings for Telugu corpus. Achieved 82% accuracy with Bi-LSTM model.

projects.title: Social Distance Monitoring System
projects.description: Real-time social distance violation detection using YOLOv3 with Euclidean distance computation and automated CCTV monitoring pipeline.

projects.title: Hand Gesture Controlled Robotic Arm
projects.description: Gesture-based human-machine interface with Master-Slave control system. Wireless robotic arm control using natural hand movements.

projects.title: Handwritten Character Recognition using HMM
projects.description: Machine learning model translating scanned handwritten documents to digital text. Achieved 99.9% accuracy using Viterbi algorithm.

projects.title: Real-Time Ball Tracking and Trajectory Analysis
projects.description: Automated object tracking for sports analytics with HSV color space conversion. Achieved 32+ FPS with 3D trajectory visualization.

projects.title: Number Writing Robotic Manipulator
projects.description: Robotic manipulator performing precision writing tasks using ROS and MoveIt! framework with custom URDF model.

projects.title: Operating Systems Chat Room Application
projects.description: Real-time messaging application implementing OS concepts: IPC, process synchronization, and mutex locks for race condition prevention.

projects.title: Predictive Text Generator using Markov Chains
projects.description: Predictive text application using Markov Chain theory for stochastic text generation. Evaluated trade-offs with LSTM-based approaches.

publications.title: Detection of Real and Manipulated Videos using Transfer Learning
publications.conference: Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)
publications.description: Proposed deep learning framework combining transfer learning architectures with temporal models for deepfake detection.

publications.title: Indian Sign Language Generation from Live Audio/Text (Tamil)
publications.conference: International Conference on Advanced Computing and Communication Systems (ICACCS)
publications.description: Developed real-time speech-to-sign translation pipeline integrating NLP and computer vision for accessibility.

certifications.name: Building Transformer-Based Natural Language Processing Applications

awards.title: Wall of Fame Award (Q4 FY24)
awards.description: Exceptional contribution to GenAI platform development

awards.title: Client Recognition Award
awards.description: Successful delivery of production-grade GenAI solutions meeting client requirements

awards.title: Best Team Award (FY24 Q4)
awards.description: Collaborative excellence in delivering complex AI projects

leadership.activities: Organized workshops and cultural events. Coordinated monthly photography competitions during COVID-19.
Participated in campus cleanliness drives and promoted organic farming awareness.
